sentences.english: Also she explained why water turned into ice when it was cold.
sentences.chinese: 并且她还解释为什么天冷的时候水可变成冰。

sentences.english: The old man kept a large reserve of firewood for cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 这位老人贮存了大量的柴薪以备天冷时用。

sentences.english: In the evenings, or in cold weather, they wore identical heavy navy-blue sailor's sweaters.
sentences.chinese: 在晚上，或天冷时，他们穿着同样的厚实的海军蓝。

sentences.english: My car is relwUmilo start in cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 我的车天冷时不好起动。

sentences.english: The red and the white rose were whithering in the cold.
sentences.chinese: 红玫瑰和白玫瑰由于天冷正在枯萎。

sentences.english: It was so cold the car wouldn't start.
sentences.chinese: 天冷得汽车的引擎都无法发动了。

sentences.english: In the cold weather a second cotton tunic over the first one sufficed.
sentences.chinese: 天冷的话，就在身上的布衣上顶多加上一件棉布外褂。

sentences.english: Gear lubricants may congeal and channel in cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 天冷时齿轮润滑油可能凝结并形成凹槽。

sentences.english: It's getting cold recently, I do not know how it is going on over the last two years particularly cold.
sentences.chinese: 天冷了，我不知道是怎么回事，这两年特别怕冷。

sentences.english: The current cold weather, it is better first went to the south of Wei and Chu Shou Fu .
sentences.chinese: 目前天冷，不如先去收服南方的魏国和楚国。

sentences.english: The girls played on the set for almost an hour in chilly weather, she said.
sentences.chinese: 在天冷的时候孩子们还要在那里玩上将近一个小时。

sentences.english: Her thin arms trembled in the cold.
sentences.chinese: 她的瘦弱的胳膊由于天冷而颤抖着。
天冷了，请穿上暖和的衣服。

sentences.english: It was cold, remember to wear a hat and scarf.
sentences.chinese: 天冷了，记得围上围巾，戴好帽子。

sentences.english: The old man keeps a large reserve of firewood for cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 这位老人保存了大量生火木柴天冷时用。

sentences.english: Days freezing, snowing, and fast black.
sentences.chinese: 天冷极了，下着雪，又快黑了。

definition: cold weather, frozen ground (idiom); bitterly cold
to defend against the cold/to keep warm
to freeze/to feel very cold/aspic or jelly
to stay warm/to protect against the cold
to go out/to leave home/to go on a journey/away from home/(of a woman) to get married
